Cajun Roasted Vegetable Bowl with Garlic Sauce. Serve in a bowl with crunchy greens Or make Wraps. That Garlic Dressing! ðŸ˜‹ & From Scratch Cajun Blend!

Mushrooms, Cauliflower, Sweet Potato, Peppers, Onions, tossed in Cajun spice blend and roasted. Serve in a Bowl or Wrap or tacos. Easy, Hearty, Smoky, spicy and SO FLAVORFUL. ðŸŒ®ðŸŒ®

I make my own Cajun blend as then it is easier to control the heat, flavor and salt. See the Recipe on the post. Add some sprouted/cooked lentils, beans or chickpeas to the veggie bowl for a hearty meal. Once you have the dressing, this is a quick Sheet pan dinner! 
Vegan Glutenfree Soy-free Recipe. Can be Nut-free.
More Bowl Meals: https://www.veganricha.com/tag/bowl

#vegan #veganism #easyveganrecipes #veganrecipes #veganricha #cooking 
Music: In the Music by Gran Torino

recipeIngredient: 1/2  head of small cauliflower (, chopped into small florets)
1 cup of other chopped veggies like squash, (broccoli, carrots, or root vegetables)
2 tbsp Cajun spice blend ((homemade) , less or more to preference and amount of veggies, Make a double batch of the blend )
1/2 tsp salt ((3/4 tsp if the cajun blend doesnt have salt))
1/2 cup cashews (soaked for atleast and hour or do a quick soak by boiling for 5 minutes)
3/4 tsp garlic powder or 6 cloves of roasted garlic
2 tsp nutritional yeast (optional, use a tsp of miso instead)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Chop the vegetables and add to a large bowl with a lid.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Chop the vegetables and add to a large bowl with a lid.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the spices, cajun spice, nutritional yeast if using, and salt in a bowl and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix all the spices, cajun spice, nutritional yeast if using, and salt in a bowl and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle the oil and lemon on the veggies. Close the lid and shake to coat well. Or rub in using hands.
recipeInstructions.name: Drizzle the oil and lemon on the veggies. Close the lid and shake to coat well. Or rub in using hands.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the spices all over, close the lid and shake shake to coat. Spread the vegetables on parchment lined sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle the spices all over, close the lid and shake shake to coat. Spread the vegetables on parchment lined sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 30 minutes. Move the veggies around after 20 mins and also remove the quick cooking veggies like peppers if they are roasted.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 30 minutes. Move the veggies around after 20 mins and also remove the quick cooking veggies like peppers if they are roasted.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the garlic sauce: Blend until smooth. Taste and adjust flavor, salt, herbs. Add some black pepper if you wish.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the garlic sauce: Blend until smooth. Taste and adjust flavor, salt, herbs. Add some black pepper if you wish.

recipeInstructions.text: Assemble your bowl, wraps or tacos with greens or lettuce, generous helping of the roasted vegetables, drizzle of the garlic sauce, some onion or tomato (optional).
recipeInstructions.name: Assemble your bowl, wraps or tacos with greens or lettuce, generous helping of the roasted vegetables, drizzle of the garlic sauce, some onion or tomato (optional).

@graph.keywords: cajun roasted veggies, summer vegetable bowl, vegan garlic sauce
